io.netty.handler.codec.socks

Class SocksRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.socks.SocksMessage
      • io.netty.handler.codec.socks.SocksRequest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SocksAuthRequest, SocksCmdRequest, SocksInitRequest, UnknownSocksRequest

    public abstract class SocksRequest
extends SocksMessage
    An abstract class that defines a SocksRequest, providing common properties for SocksInitRequest, SocksAuthRequest, SocksCmdRequest and UnknownSocksRequest.
    See Also:
    SocksInitRequest, SocksAuthRequest, SocksCmdRequest, UnknownSocksRequest
